dashboard.title: Tenant Dashboard
dashboard.description: Here you can manage your files, access permissions, and configuration settings.
dashboard.profile_desc: View and manage your profile information
dashboard.access_desc: View OpenVPN connection information and certificate management

access.title: Access Management
access.cert_desc: This section displays your OpenVPN certificate information. Please ensure you have a valid certificate to access the VPN.
access.no_certificates_desc: You currently don't have any certificates. Please apply for a new certificate to access the VPN service.
access.waiting_approval_desc: Your certificate request has been submitted and is awaiting administrator approval. The certificate will be displayed here once approved.

data.title: Data Management
data.description: Here you can manage your files and data storage
